title: This font is driviing me mad - similar to interstate but …
content:
I need to adapt this logo, but can’t find the typeface. Can anyone help? It’s quite similar to Interstate light but check the roundness of the ’O’ and the slightly bulbous ’R’.

I’m getting desperate. Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091122140556im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RS_logo_final_5866.jpg)
author: Dan Brady

comments.content:
Could be [Highway Sans from Parachute](http://web.archive.org/web/20091122140556/http:/www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&ShowFontFamilySample=1&FontFamilyID=22&FontStyleID=&CharacterSetID=42).

Please convert images to RGB before uploading. Thanks.

PF Highway Sans Pro Thin ??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091122140556im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PFHighwaySansPro-Thin_4483.png)
  
EDIT: Jan beats me to the punch again.

Good god, you guys are the business … thanks so much :)

(and btw I only realised it was cmyk when it appeared in a crazy colour - in my haste I had forgotten)

Thanks again :)
